thread.title: Army intensifies search and combing operations
thread.title_full: Army intensifies search and combing operations

title: Army intensifies search and combing operations
text:
Army intensifies search and combing operations | Six terrorists killed after clash between security forces and terrorists in Orakzai 
ISLAMABAD: Following the string of terrorist attacks across Pakistan the military apparatus has intensified operations across the country. 
According to a statement released by the Inter-Services Public Relations (ISPR) branch of the Pakistan Army, a high-level meeting was held on Friday chaired by the Corps Commander Rawalpindi and attended by senior officials of law enforcement agencies. 
During the meeting security forces and intelligence outfits were instructed to further intensify combing and targeted operations with the aim to eliminate terrorists and sleepers cells. 
The meeting reviewed the response mechanism and take stock of the security situation. 0 0 Army intensifies search and combing operations was posted in pakistan of Geo TV - https://www.geo.tv on February 17, 2017 and was last updated on February 17, 2017. This news story is related to Pakistan News, Army News, Army Operations, Pindi Corps, Rawalpindi Corps. Permanent link to the news story "Army intensifies search and combing operations" is https://www.geo.tv/latest/131439-Army-intensifies-search-and-combing-operations . More From Pakistan:
